```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
base_path <- rprojroot::find_rstudio_root_file()

data_path <- file.path(base_path, "test/paper_data/BYI_DEMO.DAT")
```

```{r}
# devtools::install_github("sooyongl/GRShiny")
library(GRShiny)
library(data.table)
```

## Data import

```{r import-data}
paperdt <- data.table::fread(data_path)[,-c(1:4)]
```

## lavaan model

```{r}
lav_model <- genLavSyn(paperdt, nfac = 1)
```

## Conduct GRM with WLS and ML

```{r}
fit.wl <- runGRM(paperdt, lav_model, estimator = "WL")
fit.ml <- runGRM(paperdt, lav_model, estimator = "ML")
```

## Results {.tabset}

### Fit

```{r}
extract_fit(fit.wl)
extract_fit(fit.ml)
```

### EStimate

```{r}
extract_est(fit.wl);
extract_est(fit.ml);
```

### GRM parameter

```{r}
round(fit.wl$grm.par,3)
round(fit.ml$grm.par,3)
```


## IRT plots

```{r}
GRShiny::ICCplot(fit.wl, 1:3, plot.ps = F)
GRShiny::ICCplot(fit.wl, 1:3, plot.ps = T)
GRShiny::ESplot(fit.wl, 1:3)
GRShiny::FSplot(fit.wl, type = "histogram")
GRShiny::infoPlot(fit.wl, 1:3)
GRShiny::infoPlot(fit.wl, type = "tcc")
```
